question: Question_Section_202_07_(b)
statement:
We want to interpolate through \emph{(0, 1)}, \emph{(1, 0)}, \emph{(2,
2)} using cubic splines

\begin{align*}f(x) = \begin{cases}
p_1(x), & 0 \leq x \leq 1 \\
p_2(x), & 1 \leq x \leq 2
\end{cases}\end{align*}

\textbf{(b)} \emph{$f$(x)} must pass through all given points. Write down
the linear equations expressing this condition.
